Package qlearning.domain.exploration

Objects supporting the exploration of the problem space.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExplorationStrategy
    The algorithm that is used to determine the next Action to take.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExplorationFactor  
    RandomExplorationStrategy
    A simple ExplorationStrategy which will choose a random Action some of the time.

Package qlearning.domain.exploration Description

Objects supporting the exploration of the problem space.

Exploration usually means taking actions that are not the most immediately profitable with the intent to escape local maxima and find global maxima.
